conditions.title: Conditions of Use
conditions.intro: Welcome to Xyvo. By accessing or using our services, you agree to comply with the following conditions.
conditions.acceptance: By using Xyvo, you agree to be bound by all applicable laws and the terms outlined in this agreement. If you do not agree, do not use our services.
conditions.intellectual: All content, trademarks, logos, and software are the property of Xyvo Inc. or its licensors and are protected under Canadian, US, and international copyright and IP laws.
conditions.disclaimer: Our services are provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted or error-free.
conditions.limitation: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Xyvo Inc. shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of our services.
conditions.userConduct: You agree not to misuse the platform, engage in unlawful activity, or attempt unauthorized access to our systems.
conditions.governingLaw: This agreement shall be governed by the laws of Alberta, Canada and applicable federal laws of Canada and the United States. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Alberta or relevant federal jurisdiction.
conditions.modification: Xyvo reserves the right to update or change these terms at any time. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of those changes.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how Xyvo collects, uses, and protects your personal data in accordance with Canadian (PIPEDA), US (CCPA), and international standards.
privacy.collection: We collect information you provide directly (name, email, phone, org details), and data through your usage (IP, browser, cookies, usage logs).
privacy.usage: We use your data to provide and improve our services, send updates, enforce terms, and ensure platform security. We do not sell personal data.
privacy.sharing: We may share data with trusted processors for analytics, cloud infrastructure, or legal compliance. All third parties must comply with applicable privacy laws.
privacy.security: We implement organizational, technical, and administrative measures to protect your data. No method is 100% secure, but we aim for the highest standards.
privacy.yourRights: You may access, correct, or delete your data, and withdraw consent at any time. US and Canadian users have additional rights under CCPA and PIPEDA.
privacy.retention: We retain personal data only as long as necessary for service provision, legal, or business purposes. After that, data is securely deleted.
privacy.contact: For questions or to exercise your rights, contact us at privacy@xyvo.ca.

FeaturesSection.title: Built for Speed & Intelligence
FeaturesSection.subtitle: Xyvo combines the elegance of Motion with the power of Azure Boards, enhanced by deep AI integration
FeaturesSection.aiDesc: GPT-4o and UX Pilot AI generate sprint plans, write acceptance criteria, and predict delays in natural language.
FeaturesSection.pmDesc: Manage Projects, Sprints, Tasks, and Teams with velocity tracking and burn-down charts.
FeaturesSection.integrationsDesc: Sync tasks from Slack, Discord, GitHub, or voice input with customizable workflows.

ViewsSection.switchViews: Switch between Kanban, Table, Calendar, and Timeline views seamlessly
ViewsSection.name: Name

AIThinkingPartnerSection.title: Your AI Thinking Partner
AIThinkingPartnerSection.description: Xyvo's AI integration goes beyond automation ‚Äì it becomes your strategic thinking partner for better project outcomes.
AIThinkingPartnerSection.voiceDesc: Speak your thoughts and watch them become structured backlog items with effort estimates and deadlines.
AIThinkingPartnerSection.analyticsDesc: AI predicts delays, suggests priorities, and answers 'What should I work on next?' in natural language.
AIThinkingPartnerSection.automationDesc: Auto-generate sprint plans, write acceptance criteria, and tag tasks intelligently.
AIThinkingPartnerSection.chat1: What should I work on next?
AIThinkingPartnerSection.chat2: Based on your sprint goals and team velocity, I recommend focusing on the User Authentication task (5 points). It's blocking 2 other tasks and aligns with your current sprint priority.
AIThinkingPartnerSection.chat3: Create a task for mobile optimization
AIThinkingPartnerSection.chat4: ‚úì Created task 'Mobile Optimization' with 8 story points, assigned to Frontend team, due next Friday. Added acceptance criteria and linked to current sprint.
